languages.text: {n}Ваш окрик действует на офицера не хуже пощечины: он вскидывается и смотрит на вас прояснившимся взглядом — который тут же наполняется ужасом, когда офицер видит, что его окружает.{/n} "Храни нас Император..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваш окрик действует на офицера не хуже пощечины: он вскидывается и смотрит на вас прояснившимся взглядом — который тут же наполняется ужасом, когда офицер видит, что его окружает.{/n} "Храни нас Император..."

languages.text: {n}Your outburst lands like a slap to the officer's face: he jolts and looks at you with a cleared gaze that immediately fills with horror when he notices his surroundings.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш окрик действует на офицера не хуже пощечины: он вскидывается и смотрит на вас прояснившимся взглядом — который тут же наполняется ужасом, когда офицер видит, что его окружает.{/n} "Храни нас Император..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Your outburst lands like a slap to the officer's face: he jolts and looks at you with a cleared gaze that immediately fills with horror when he notices his surroundings.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

{n}Your outburst lands like a slap to the officer's face: he jolts and looks at you with a cleared gaze that immediately fills with horror when he notices his surroundings.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

{n}Your outburst lands like a slap to the officer's face: he jolts and looks at you with a cleared gaze that immediately fills with horror when he notices his surroundings.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

{n}Your outburst lands like a slap to the officer's face: he jolts and looks at you with a cleared gaze that immediately fills with horror when he notices his surroundings.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

languages.text: {n}怒声が士官を目覚めさせたようだ。彼はたじろぎ、目に光が宿り、周囲の状況に気づくとすぐに顔が恐怖に歪んだ。{/n}「皇帝よ、我らをお守りください…」
languages.original_text: {n}Your outburst lands like a slap to the officer's face: he jolts and looks at you with a cleared gaze that immediately fills with horror when he notices his surroundings.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}怒声が士官を目覚めさせたようだ。彼はたじろぎ、目に光が宿り、周囲の状況に気づくとすぐに顔が恐怖に歪んだ。{/n}「皇帝よ、我らをお守りください…」

languages.text: {n}你的怒火就像一记耳光一样，打在了军官的脸上。他晃了晃，以清晰的目光看向你，但当他注意到周围的环境时，他的立刻充满了恐惧。{/n}“愿帝皇保佑我们……”
languages.original_text: {n}Your outburst lands like a slap to the officer's face: he jolts and looks at you with a cleared gaze that immediately fills with horror when he notices his surroundings.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的怒火就像一记耳光一样，打在了军官的脸上。他晃了晃，以清晰的目光看向你，但当他注意到周围的环境时，他的立刻充满了恐惧。{/n}“愿帝皇保佑我们……”

languages.text: {n}Tu estallido golpea al oficial como una bofetada. Da un respingo y mira a su alrededor con la mirada clara y cada vez más horrorizada al darse cuenta de lo que le rodea.{/n} «Que el Emperador nos proteja...».
languages.original_text: {n}Your outburst lands like a slap to the officer's face: he jolts and looks at you with a cleared gaze that immediately fills with horror when he notices his surroundings.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu estallido golpea al oficial como una bofetada. Da un respingo y mira a su alrededor con la mirada clara y cada vez más horrorizada al darse cuenta de lo que le rodea.{/n} «Que el Emperador nos proteja...».

languages.text: {n}Votre éclat de voix fait lui l'effet d'une gifle : il sursaute et pose sur vous un regard de nouveau lucide qui devient rapidement horrifié lorsqu'il remarque où il se trouve.{/n} « Que l'Empereur nous préserve... »
languages.original_text: {n}Your outburst lands like a slap to the officer's face: he jolts and looks at you with a cleared gaze that immediately fills with horror when he notices his surroundings.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre éclat de voix fait lui l'effet d'une gifle : il sursaute et pose sur vous un regard de nouveau lucide qui devient rapidement horrifié lorsqu'il remarque où il se trouve.{/n} « Que l'Empereur nous préserve... »

languages.text: {n}Dein Ausbruch ist für den Offizier wie ein Schlag ins Gesicht: Er zuckt zusammen, sieht dich mit klarem Blick an, und große Angst überkommt ihn, als er seine Umgebung bemerkt.{/n} "Der Imperator bewahre uns ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Your outburst lands like a slap to the officer's face: he jolts and looks at you with a cleared gaze that immediately fills with horror when he notices his surroundings.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein Ausbruch ist für den Offizier wie ein Schlag ins Gesicht: Er zuckt zusammen, sieht dich mit klarem Blick an, und große Angst überkommt ihn, als er seine Umgebung bemerkt.{/n} "Der Imperator bewahre uns ..."

languages.text: {n}Bu ani patlama, subayın yüzüne tokat gibi iniyor. Sarsılıyor ve berraklaşmış gözlerle sana bakıyor. Çevresinde neler olduğunu fark ettiği anda ise bu gözler dehşetle doluyor.{/n} "İmparator bizi esirgesin."
languages.original_text: {n}Your outburst lands like a slap to the officer's face: he jolts and looks at you with a cleared gaze that immediately fills with horror when he notices his surroundings.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu ani patlama, subayın yüzüne tokat gibi iniyor. Sarsılıyor ve berraklaşmış gözlerle sana bakıyor. Çevresinde neler olduğunu fark ettiği anda ise bu gözler dehşetle doluyor.{/n} "İmparator bizi esirgesin."
